author: Mauigirl
title: Comment on Peggy Noonan Nonsense (Limerick) by Mauigirl
text: For the rise of The Donald . This claim By Ms. Noonan is mad: Seems Obama’s the lad Who’s at fault. “Pundit” dame has no shame.   Friday, October 16th, 2015 at 3:25   Barack Obama , Campaign Humor , Donald Trump , Election Satire , GOP Humor , Media   Republicans Humor .   “Peggy Noonan Nonsense (Limerick)”
